name: EU Artificial Intelligence Act
description: Comprehensive risk-based regulatory framework for AI systems in the European Union, establishing mandatory requirements for high-risk AI systems including conformity assessments, transparency obligations, and human oversight.
key_requirements: Transparency obligations for all AI systems
embedding_text: EU Artificial Intelligence Act. Comprehensive risk-based regulatory framework for AI systems. Mandatory conformity assessment for high-risk AI. Transparency obligations. Human oversight. Data governance. Regulatory sandboxes. Covers healthcare, education, employment, law enforcement, critical infrastructure, finance. Risk classification: unacceptable, high, limited, minimal risk. Fundamental rights protection. Explainability requirements. Post-market monitoring.
